Class ApplicationCLI

Object
ApplicationCLI
public class ApplicationCLI extends Object
Handles the applicant's interaction with BTO project applications. Applicants can view available projects, submit applications, check their application status, or withdraw an existing application. Filtering and table display are supported for better navigation.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Javier

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationCLI

      public ApplicationCLI(ApplicationController applicationController, String nric, Map<String,Filter> userFilters)
      Constructs a CLI interface for applicants to manage their BTO applications. Initializes a shared filter object based on the applicant's NRIC.
      Parameters:
      applicationController - Controller that manages application logic.
      nric - The NRIC of the current applicant (used to retrieve or create their filter).
      userFilters - Shared map of filters by NRIC.

  • Method Details

    • setBreadcrumb

      public void setBreadcrumb(Breadcrumb breadcrumb)
      Sets the breadcrumb object to display navigation context.
      Parameters:
      breadcrumb - The Breadcrumb instance to use.

    • start

      public void start(Applicant applicant)
      Starts the applicant application loop. Allows users to view projects, check status, or withdraw application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The logged-in applicant.

    • showMenu

      private void showMenu()
      Displays the application management menu options.

    • viewAllAvailableProject

      private void viewAllAvailableProject(Applicant applicant)
      Displays a list of all visible BTO projects the applicant is eligible to apply for. Prompts for filtering and allows submission if the user has no active application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The logged-in applicant.

    • submitApplication

      private void submitApplication(Applicant applicant)
      Handles the application submission flow. Ensures only eligible applicants apply for valid and available projects.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The logged-in applicant.

    • viewApplicationStatus

      private void viewApplicationStatus(Applicant applicant)
      Displays the status of the applicant’s latest application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The logged-in applicant.

    • withdrawApplication

      private void withdrawApplication(Applicant applicant)
      Handles withdrawal of the applicant’s current active application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The logged-in applicant.

    • setProjectFilter

      private void setProjectFilter()
      Prompts the user to input filter criteria such as neighborhood, flat type, and price range for project viewing.

    • clearFilters

      private void clearFilters()
      Prompts the user to reset all filters used for project viewing.
